data.eml:eml: Six new species and three new records of infaunal alpheid shrimps from the genera Leptalpheus Williams, 1965 and Fenneralpheus Felder & Manning, 1986 (Crustacea, Decapoda)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Anker, Arthur (2011): Six new species and three new records of infaunal alpheid shrimps from the genera Leptalpheus Williams, 1965 and Fenneralpheus Felder & Manning, 1986 (Crustacea, Decapoda). Zootaxa 3041: 1-38, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.278802
